introduction: After seeing an ecocritical film, the young protagonists wake up to societal matters. Johanna's father is a prime minister and Rauno's father works in the same government. Rauno opposes his father and the current conditions, seeing the modern urban life as demoralising and conforming. Rauno runs away from home, later meeting with Johanna to escape from the city to the countryside.A story about the rise of awareness among the youth against the pollution and eco-system disaster. The conflict between the youth and ruling establishment is also taken under the inspection. The daughter of the prime minister and her relation to the son of another minister of opposing party is especially under surveillance.
